TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SessionSecurityTokenHandler extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler

summary.span: 类型的 进程安全标志。

span.span: A that processes security tokens of type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类序列化、 反序列化，并验证会话令牌。The class serializes, deserializes, and validates session tokens. 会话令牌是类型的令牌。Session tokens are tokens of type . 类序列化的令牌和 cookie 格式。The class serializes the tokens to and from cookie format. 默认情况下，类将序列化令牌到 WS 安全会话 Feb2005 或 Ws-secure Conversation 1.3``元素。By default, the class serializes tokens into WS-Secure Conversation Feb2005 or WS-Secure Conversation 1.3 `` elements. 通过使用会话令牌(WSFAM) 和(SAM) 来存储有关会话的信息这主要是与经过身份验证的用户和会话开始和到期时间。Session tokens are used by the (WSFAM) and the (SAM) to store information about a session, this is primarily the associated with the authenticated user and the session start and expiration times. 在被动方案中，调入(SAM) 中创建的会话令牌的身份验证管道表示已经过身份验证的用户。In passive scenarios, the calls into the (SAM) from the authentication pipeline to create a session token from the that represents the authenticated user. SAM 使用其配置创建令牌和其序列化到 cookie （以及要反序列化中的后续请求的 cookie 令牌）。The SAM uses its configured to create the token and to serialize it into a cookie (and to deserialize the token from a cookie on subsequent requests). SAM 使用其已配置的实例类将写回到 HTTP 响应的 cookie。The SAM uses an instance of its configured class to write the cookie back to the HTTP Response. 保存的 cookie，然后返回到客户端和客户端可以在后续请求提供 cookie，而不是无需进行一次往返过程返回到要重新获取安全令牌的标识提供程序。This cookie is then returned to the client and on subsequent requests the client can present the cookie rather than making a round trip back to the identity provider to re-obtain a security token. 有关会话如何运行使用 WIF 的详细信息，请参阅[WIF 会话管理](~/docs/framework/security/wif-session-management.md)。For more information about how sessions operate with WIF, see [WIF Session Management](~/docs/framework/security/wif-session-management.md). > [!NOTE] > \ 配置元素可用于指定，其职责是保护应用程序的会话。The \ configuration element can be used to specify a that has the responsibility for securing the application’s sessions. 开发人员应格外小心在更改此配置设置，因为配置不正确的系统可能会导致应用程序被破坏。Developers should use caution when changing this configuration setting, as a misconfigured system could result in application compromise. 例如，如果指定的派生的超链接"http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/hh193426%28v=vs.110%29.aspx"\t"_blank"和将一个空的转换 (CookieTransform) 集合传递给基，会导致正在序列化到未受保护的 cookie 的用户标识。For example, specifying a derived HYPERLINK "http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/hh193426%28v=vs.110%29.aspx" \t "_blank" and passing an empty Transforms (CookieTransform) collection to the base, would result in the users identity being serialized into a cookie that was not protected. 这可能允许攻击者修改的标识，因此更改访问权限。This could allow an attacker to modify the identity and therefore change access privileges. 如果会话令牌是在引用模式下，即，其属性是`true`，该会话标记处理程序只序列化属性的会话令牌所需重新生成其密钥。If the session token is in reference mode, that is, its property is `true`, the session token handler only serializes properties of the session token that are needed to regenerate its key in the . 默认情况下，类用于表示缓存密钥，并标记处理程序写入和令牌的属性。In the default case, the class is used to represent cache keys, and the token handler writes the and properties of the token. 如果会话令牌是不在引用模式下，即属性是`false`，然后，除了前面提到的属性，该处理程序调用方法从该令牌，然后存储序列化的字节数组还在 cookie 中的结果值。If the session token is not in reference mode, that is, the property is `false`, then, in addition to the properties mentioned previously, the handler invokes the method on a byte array serialized from the token and stores the resulting value in the cookie as well. 有关如何序列化令牌的更多详细信息，请参阅方法。For more details about how the token is serialized, see the method. 属性获取的转换应用于会话的列表中标记方法。The property gets the list of transforms that are applied to the session token in the method. 派生自所有转换类。All transforms derive from the class. 默认情况下和应用。In the default case the and the are applied. 使用数据保护 API (DPAPI) 来保护 cookie 材料。The uses the Data Protection API (DPAPI) to protect the cookie material. DPAPI 使用的是特定于正在其它运行在其保护算法中的计算机的密钥。DPAPI uses a key that is specific to the computer on which it is running in its protection algorithms. 出于此原因，默认会话标记处理程序不是可在 Web 场方案中使用因为在这种情况下，令牌在一台计算机上编写可能需要在另一台计算机上读取。For this reason, the default session token handler is not usable in Web farm scenarios because, in such scenarios, tokens written on one computer may need to be read on another computer. 许多策略可用于绕过此问题。You can use many strategies to circumvent this issue. 例如，你可以：For example, you can: - 替换默认与。Replace the default with the . 使您能够指定签名和加密密钥在 ASP.NET 下的``配置文件中的元素。The enables you to specify signing and encryption keys under the ASP.NET `` element in the configuration file. - 提供的处理程序事件中的 global.asax.cs 文件和替换默认会话令牌处理程序替换的实例已包括一系列转换和。Provide a handler for the event in the global.asax.cs file and replace the default session token handler with an instance of that has a list of transforms that includes the and the . 可以通过调用的转换列表的构造函数之一创建新实例。You can create the new instance by invoking one of the constructors that takes a list of transforms. - 派生自定义转换从基本类和使用上面的方法来将其包含在要应用的转换列表。Derive a custom transform from the base class and use the method above to include it in the list of transforms to be applied. - 派生的自定义令牌处理程序从和实现您自己的机制。Derive a custom token handler from and implement your own mechanism. 有关在 Web 场方案中使用会话的详细信息，请参阅[WIF 和 Web 场](~/docs/framework/security/wif-and-web-farms.md)。For more information about using sessions in Web farm scenarios, see [WIF and Web Farms](~/docs/framework/security/wif-and-web-farms.md). 包含在默认标记处理程序集合; 但是，您可以将其替换为自定义会话标记处理程序通过第一个指定[<删除>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/remove.md)元素下[ <securityTokenHandlers> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/securitytokenhandlers.md)要从集合，然后添加你的自定义令牌处理程序使用删除的默认处理程序元素[<添加>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/add.md)元素。The is included in the default token handler collection; however, you can replace it with a custom session token handler by first specifying a [<remove>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/remove.md) element under the [<securityTokenHandlers>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/securitytokenhandlers.md) element to remove the default handler from the collection and then adding your custom token handler using the [<add>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/add.md) element. 默认情况下，可以通过包含指定的默认令牌生存期[ <sessionTokenRequirement> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/sessiontokenrequirement.md)元素下的``元素。By default, you can specify the default token lifetime by including the [<sessionTokenRequirement>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/sessiontokenrequirement.md) element under the `` element. 您可以设计自定义令牌处理程序，才能自定义配置元素下的``通过重写元素方法以提供逻辑来处理它们。You can design a custom token handler to take custom configuration elements under the `` element by overriding the method to provide the logic to process them. ## Examples 下面的 XML 演示如何使用的实例替换令牌处理程序集合中的默认会话安全令牌处理配置中的类。The following XML shows how to replace the default session security token handler in a token handler collection with an instance of the class in configuration. ```xml ```

span.span: <sessionTokenRequirement>
WIF and Web Farms
WIF Session Management

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当编码 cookie 转换中的显示顺序应用属性。When encoding a cookie transforms are applied in the order in which they appear in the property. 当解码 cookie，它们会按相反的顺序应用。When decoding a cookie, they are applied in the reverse order. 从调用和方法进行编码和解码 cookie 材料。Called from the and methods to encode and decode the cookie material.

span.span: The transforms to use.

summary.span: 设置要应用在 cookie 上的转换。

span.span: Sets the transforms that will be applied to cookies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置的转换返回的列表属性。Sets the list of transforms returned by the property. 将出现在列表中进行编码 cookie 时和相反顺序解码 cookie 时的顺序应用转换。Transforms will be applied in the order in which they appear in the list when encoding a cookie and in the reverse order when decoding a cookie. > [!WARNING] > 如果`transforms`参数是`null`，将从引发异常方法调用进行编码或解码 cookie 时。If the `transforms` parameter is `null`, an exception will be thrown from the method when it is called to encode or decode the cookie.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，如果[ <sessionTokenRequirement> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/sessiontokenrequirement.md)配置文件中指定元素属性初始化的值为`lifetime`特性方法。By default, if the [<sessionTokenRequirement>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/sessiontokenrequirement.md) element is specified in the configuration file, the property is initialized to the value of the `lifetime` attribute by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 令牌不是有效如果其属性设置为更高版本发生的值比，或者，如果其属性设置为发生的值早于。The token is not valid if its property is set to a value that occurs later than , or if its property is set to a value that occurs earlier than . 从调用方法以验证该会话。Called from the methods to validate the session.

The identities that are contained in the token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 执行检查，以确保指定的标记作用域为指定的终结点 ID 和，如果是这样，调用方法; 否则，将引发。Performs a check to make sure that the specified token is scoped for the specified endpoint ID and, if so, invokes the method; otherwise, throws a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 具有会话令牌属性是`null`或全局划分作用域被视为空。Session tokens that have an property that is `null` or empty are considered to be globally scoped. 这会带来潜在的安全风险。This presents a potential security risk. 出于此原因，应确保属性设置中会话令牌。For this reason you should make sure that the property is set in your session tokens.

is .
is not assignable from .

The token to serialize.
An instance of .

summary.span: 使用指定 XML 编写器序列化指定令牌。

span.span: Serializes the specified token by using the specified XML writer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现序列化为指定的令牌的 WS 安全会话 Feb2005 或 Ws-secure Conversation 1.3``元素，具体取决于值属性。The default implementation serializes the specified token as either a WS-Secure Conversation Feb2005 or WS-Secure Conversation 1.3 `` element, depending on the value of the property. 属性序列化为`Id`属性。The property is serialized as the `Id` attribute. 属性序列化为``子元素。The property is serialized as the `` child element. 如果不是`null`属性序列化为``元素。If not `null` the property is serialized as an `` element. 最后，如果属性是`false`，将整个标记序列化到二进制数组传递到方法进行编码。Finally, if the property is `false`, the entire token is serialized into binary array which is passed to the method to be encoded. 编码后的标记然后作为 base64 编码值写入到的元素和指定命名空间和属性。The encoded token is then written as a base64 encoded value to the element and namespace specified by the and properties. 如果属性是`true`，不序列化令牌。If the property is `true`, the token is not serialized.
